name: barf
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to vomit: He got drunk and barfed all over the carpet. The smell was so disgusting it made me want to barf. Synonyms
honk (VOMIT) UK slang
puke slang
regurgitate
throw (something) up informal
More examplesFewer examplesI think I'm gonna barf.Some children tell us that they eat until they start to barf. All I know about babies is that they cry, barf, and poop a lot.

the substance that comes out of your mouth when you vomit: It smells like barf in here. You may need to have a barf bucket handy.
More examplesFewer examplesThat cheese smells like barf!A whiff of barf was coming from the bathroom.
